title: I can't reconnect and keep walking to their bas
body: I just keep walking to their base for no reason and I can't click anywhere. I'm trying  to disconnect and reconnect it but game doesn't let me reconnect lol. Thanks riot for this trolling and I got ban for a weeks so you happy now riot :) ps. I play this in MacBook pro

replies.body: I had that happen to me several times, so I feel your pain a lot.
